summary: Silent Hill is a popular horror video game series, later adapted into movies and books. Created by Keiichiro Toyama, it follows everyday people trapped in the mysterious, scary town of Silent Hill. The first four games were made by a team within Konami called Team Silent. The franchise is known for its psychological horror, where the characters' minds and fears are often the source of terror. It has sold millions of copies and expanded into other media, becoming a well-loved horror icon.
title: Silent Hill
